title: NURS 420 Clinical Nursing Focus: Adults Experiencing Acute or Chronic Health Conditions
description: Credit is given for one of NURS 420, 422, 423, 424, or 425.
prerequisites: All of NURS 302, NURS 303, NURS 304, NURS 305, NURS 306, NURS 333, NURS 334, NURS 335, NURS 336, NURS 337, NURS 338, NURS 339, NURS 340, NURS 341, NURS 342, NURS 343.
